name: Kotlin
author: JetBrains
desc: Write better Android apps faster with Kotlin.

name: Jetpack
author: Google
desc: Jetpack is a suite of libraries to help developers follow best practices, reduce boilerplate code, and write code that works consistently across Android versions and devices so that developers can focus on the code they care about.

name: Gradle
author: Google
desc: Gradle is an open-source build automation tool that is designed to be flexible enough to build almost any type of software.

name: Material Design 3
author: Google
desc: Make personal devices feel personal with Material Design 3, Google’s most expressive and adaptable design system yet. Coming first to Android 12.

name: FreeReflection
author: weishu
desc: FreeReflection is a library that lets you use reflection without any restriction above Android P (includes Q and R).

name: ViewBindingPropertyDelegate
author: Android Broadcast
desc: Make work with Android View Binding simpler.

name: LeakCanary
author: Square
desc: LeakCanary is a memory leak detection library for Android.

name: Bebas Kai(改)
author: Ryoichi Tsunekawa
desc: Bebas Kai(改) is a free display font for headline, caption, and titling designed by Ryoichi Tsunekawa.

name: 中国传统色
desc: 为往圣继绝色，为万世开新颜。

name: Google Fonts
author: Google
desc: Google Fonts is a library of 1,358 free licensed font families and APIs for convenient use via CSS and Android.

name: Material Theme Builder
author: Google
desc: Visualize dynamic color, build a custom theme, and export to code.

name: Firebase
author: Google
desc: Firebase is an app development platform with tools to help you build, grow and monetize your app.
